ComicInfo.Title: Good for the Soul, Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary: "Good For The Soul" concludes with a bang- or a splat- as a reluctant Hughie takes on the resurrected Blarney Cock in a no-holds barred brawl for it all. Annie January tells A-Train the long and the short of things, Mother's Milk continues to mystify, and Butcher provides some much-needed advice on funeral arrangements. And will Hughie ever be allowed to forget his "facial incident"?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-19 09:19:45. [CVDB130022]
ComicInfo.Characters: A-Train, Black Noir, Blarney Cock, Butcher, Female of the Species, Frenchman, Jack from Jupiter, Jamie, Mother's Milk, Queen Maeve, Starlight, Terror, The Deep, Wee Hughie
ComicInfo.Locations: Flatiron Building, New York City, New York State, The Bronx
